DataModel

Class Advert

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataModel.Advert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverPattern.IObserver, ObserverPattern.ISubject

    public class Advert
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverPattern.ISubject, ObserverPattern.IObserver
    This class represents an advert associated to a Member being used by the LETS system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Advert()
      Default constructor initialises all attributes to the string "UNKNOWN".
      Advert(int advertID, int advertTypeID, int memberID, int categoryID, int itemTypeID, java.lang.String advertTitle, java.lang.String advertDescription, java.sql.Date createdDate, java.sql.Date expiryDate, int cost, java.lang.String trans, java.sql.Date completedDate, java.sql.Blob imageBlob, java.lang.String isActive)
      Constructor that initialises the advert with the provided advert details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Advert

        public Advert()
        Default constructor initialises all attributes to the string "UNKNOWN". All integers have been initialised to 0 and dates have just been initialised.

      • Advert

        public Advert(int advertID,
      int advertTypeID,
      int memberID,
      int categoryID,
      int itemTypeID,
      java.lang.String advertTitle,
      java.lang.String advertDescription,
      java.sql.Date createdDate,
      java.sql.Date expiryDate,
      int cost,
      java.lang.String trans,
      java.sql.Date completedDate,
      java.sql.Blob imageBlob,
      java.lang.String isActive)
        Constructor that initialises the advert with the provided advert details. This information is gathered from the database.
        Parameters:
        advertID - - int value to store the unique value of the Advert.
        advertTypeID - - int value to correspond to the relevant Advert Type.
        memberID - - int value to correspond to the relevant Member.
        categoryID - - int value to correspond to the relevant Category.
        itemTypeID - - int value to correspond to the relevant Item Type.
        advertTitle - - String being the title of the advert.
        advertDescription - - String being the description of the advert.
        createdDate - - SQL date being the date the advert was created.
        expiryDate - - SQL date being the date the advert expires.
        cost - - int value stating the cost associated with the advert.
        trans - - String value stating a Y or N for yes or no, in response to the advert.
        imageBlob - - Blob value storing the image of the advert.
        isActive - - String value determining whether an advert is active or not.
        completedDate - - SQL date being the date the advert has been completed.
